Albania: Fourth Crusade: Venice won control over most of Albania.
Fourth Crusade: The Byzantines regained control of the southern portion of Albania and established the Despotate of Epirus.
Bangladesh: Ikhtiyar Uddin Muhammad Bin Bakhtiyar Khalji's conquest of Bengal. Onset of Muslim rule in Bengal.
Rule of the Turkic Khilji Maliks. (to 1226)
